Franz Liszt

Ballade no. 2 in B minor, S. 170a

c. 1853 · LW – · R. –

[IMSLP]

The Ballade no. 2 in B minor (S. 171; LW A181; R. 16) exists in an earlier version (S. 170a), which is essentially identical up to the ending. Whilst the final version of the ballade ends with a slow, andantino passage, the earlier version has a choice of two fast endings.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 15 · Z. A/B 14764 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk
  • Editio Musica Budapest · Z. 12699 · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok / Adrienne Kaczmarczyk
  • Henle · HN 490 · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann / Rena Charnin Mueller [the two endings only]

Version with first ending

Duration: 14'

Difficulty: 4.5

Version with second ending

Duration: 14' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5
